function isGroupApprovalCreatedByFlowDesigner(me) { // group approval record created by workflow if (me.wait_for == "workflow") return false;
// check sys properties if (gs.getProperty("com.glide.hub.flow.approval.version", "V2") != "V2" || gs.getProperty("com.glide.hub.flow.approval.function.early_terminate", "true") != "true" || gs.getProperty("com.glide.hub.flow.approval.function.early_terminate.common_user", "true") != "true") return false;
// group approval record created by AFA if (me.wait_for == "process_flow") return true;
// group approval was created manually and picked up by AFA var grpRefGr = new GlideRecord('sys_flow_group_approval_listener_reference'); grpRefGr.addQuery('approval', me.sys_id); grpRefGr.query(); if (grpRefGr.next()) return true;
// TODO: handle the case of group approval was created manually when AFA is waiting
return false; }
if (!isGroupApprovalCreatedByFlowDesigner(current)) { var util = new WorkflowApprovalUtils(); util.setPendingUserApprovalsByGroup(current.sys_id, 'not_required'); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2008-10-22 15:44:37</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>253a59580a0a0b2677d435b165539c4b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>SNC - Moot user approvals for group</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Workflow Runtime Engine" source="com.glideapp.workflow">b6467ca03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f4a</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_253a59580a0a0b2677d435b165539c4b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>peksan.kong@snc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-11-09 20:05:16</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=253a59580a0a0b2677d435b165539c4b"/> </record_update>
